scripts.add-workspaces: jq '.workspaces=["renterd","hostd","walletd"]' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
scripts.remove-workspaces: jq 'del(.workspaces)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
scripts.version: bun run add-workspaces && bunx changeset version && bun run remove-workspaces
